question: Which organization recently published the “Food Waste Index Report, 2021”?
explanation:
The United Nation Environment Programme (UNEP) published the “Food Waste Index Report, 2021”. As per the UNEP report, estimated 931 million tonnes of food were wasted across the world 2019.
The agency also highlighted that 61% of the total food wasted came from households, 26% from food service and 13% from retail.
